analyzed: che bzhir dris te; kye mi khyod gang shes pa de ni / smros shig / gang mi shes pa ni /

original: ma smra zhig /
analyzed: ma smra zhig /

original: gang mthong ba de ni /🔽smros shig / gang ma mthong ba de ni /
analyzed: gang mthong ba de ni / smros shig / gang ma mthong ba de ni /

analyzed: ma smra zhig ces byas na /

analyzed: de mi shes bzhin du ni /

analyzed: shes so // zhes zer /

original: shes bzhin du ni /🔽mi shes so //
analyzed: shes bzhin du ni / mi shes so //

analyzed: zhes zer / ma mthong bzhin du ni /

analyzed: mthong ngo // zhes zer /

original: mthong bzhin du ni /
analyzed: mthong bzhin du ni /

analyzed: ma mthong zhes zer ta /

analyzed: de bdag gi phyir ram /

analyzed: gzhan gyi phyir ram /

original: zang zing cung zad tsam gyi phyir shes bzhin du brdzun du smra ba ma spangs pa yin no //🔽phra ma zer ba ni /🔽tshu rol pa rnams kyis thos nas de dag dbye ba'i phyir pha rol po rnams kyi thad du song ste bsnyad la /
analyzed: zang zing cung zad tsam gyi phyir shes bzhin du brdzun du smra ba ma spangs pa yin no // phra ma zer ba ni / tshu rol pa rnams kyis thos nas de dag dbye ba'i phyir pha rol po rnams kyi thad du song ste bsnyad la /
translated: or for the sake of some small material gain, he knowingly tells lies and does not give them up.🔽Slander is when, having heard something from one person, you go and tell it to someone else in order to divide them.

original: de dag gis thos na yang tshu rol pa rnams dbye ba'i phyir tshu rol pa rnams kyi thad du song ste bsnyad par byed de /
analyzed: de dag gis thos na yang tshu rol pa rnams dbye ba'i phyir tshu rol pa rnams kyi thad du song ste bsnyad par byed de /
translated: And having heard something from the other person, you go and tell it to the first person in order to divide them.

original: de ltar 'dum pa rnams dbye ba dang / bye ba rnams la rjes su phyogs la mi mthun par 'dod cing /
analyzed: de ltar 'dum pa rnams dbye ba dang / bye ba rnams la rjes su phyogs la mi mthun par 'dod cing /

original: mi mthun par dga' ste /
analyzed: mi mthun par dga' ste /

original: mi mthun par 'gyur ba'i tshig smra ba ni /
analyzed: mi mthun par 'gyur ba'i tshig smra ba ni /

original: phra ma ma spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: phra ma ma spangs pa yin no //

original: tshig rtsub mor smra ba ni /
analyzed: tshig rtsub mor smra ba ni /

original: des tshig 'jam zhing rnar snyan la /
analyzed: des tshig 'jam zhing rnar snyan la /

original: yid du 'ong ba dang / snyan pa dang / 'dod par bya ba dang / @357b pho brang 'khor gyi skad dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / zur phyin pa dang / brda phrad pa dang / rnar 'ong ba dang / skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang /
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba dang / snyan pa dang / 'dod par bya ba dang / @357b pho brang 'khor gyi skad dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / zur phyin pa dang / brda phrad pa dang / rnar 'ong ba dang / skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang /
translated: words that are sweet, clear, distinct, audible, dear to many,🔽cherished by many, loved by many, pleasing to many,

original: skye bo mang pos gces par bya ba dang / skye bo mang pos dga' ba dang / skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag dang / de lta bu'i tshig bor te tshig kun tu bzung ba dang /
analyzed: skye bo mang pos gces par bya ba dang / skye bo mang pos dga' ba dang / skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag dang / de lta bu'i tshig bor te tshig kun tu bzung ba dang /
translated: words that are meditative absorption and meditative stabilization.

original: rtsub pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bzod pa dang / gzhan gyi zher 'debs pa dang / skye bo mang po'i snying du mi sdug pa dang / skye bo mang pos gces par mi bya ba dang / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /
analyzed: rtsub pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bzod pa dang / gzhan gyi zher 'debs pa dang / skye bo mang po'i snying du mi sdug pa dang / skye bo mang pos gces par mi bya ba dang / skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /
translated: not liked by many people,🔽not pleasing to the minds of many people,

original: skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba dang / mnyam par bzhag pa ma yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du gyur pa ma yin pa gang yin pa rnams te /
analyzed: skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba dang / mnyam par bzhag pa ma yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin du gyur pa ma yin pa gang yin pa rnams te /

original: de lta bu'i tshig rnams smras na tshig rtsub po ma spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshig rnams smras na tshig rtsub po ma spangs pa yin no //
translated: If one speaks such words, harsh words are not abandoned.

original: tshig khyal ba ni /
analyzed: tshig khyal ba ni /
translated: Frivolous speech is🔽speaking at the wrong time,🔽speaking falsely,🔽speaking untruthfully,🔽speaking unbeneficial things,

original: de dus ma yin par smra ba dang / yang dag pa ma yin par smra ba dang / mi bden pa smra ba dang / phan pa ma yin pa smra ba dang / skur pa smra ba dang / chos ma yin pa smra ba dang /
analyzed: de dus ma yin par smra ba dang / yang dag pa ma yin par smra ba dang / mi bden pa smra ba dang / phan pa ma yin pa smra ba dang / skur pa smra ba dang / chos ma yin pa smra ba dang /
translated: speaking denigratingly,🔽speaking unrighteously,🔽and speaking unskillfully.

original: gya tshom du smra zhing bab col gyi tshig smra ba dang / gtan tshigs med pa dang / snyad med pa dang / don dang mi ldan pa dang / 'chal pa rnams ni /
analyzed: gya tshom du smra zhing bab col gyi tshig smra ba dang / gtan tshigs med pa dang / snyad med pa dang / don dang mi ldan pa dang / 'chal pa rnams ni /
translated: He speaks at random, speaks nonsense, speaks without reason, speaks without evidence, speaks without meaning, and speaks improperly.

original: tshig kyal pa ma spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: tshig kyal pa ma spangs pa yin no //
translated: He does not avoid idle speech.

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Bhikṣus,

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: in this way,

original: ngag gis ched du byas pa'i las rnam pa bzhi byas shing @358a *//
analyzed: ngag gis ched du byas pa'i las rnam pa bzhi byas shing @358a *//
translated: he has committed and accumulated the four types of verbal karma that are done intentionally,

analyzed: bsags pa / mi dge ba /
translated: which are nonvirtuous,

analyzed: sdug bsngal skyed la rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba yin no //
translated: produce suffering, and have the result of suffering.

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Bhikṣus,

analyzed: yid kyis ched du byas pa'i las rnam pa gsum byas shing bsags pa /

analyzed: mi dge ba /

original: sdug bsngal skyed pa /
analyzed: sdug bsngal skyed pa /
translated: produce suffering,

analyzed: rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba ji lta bu zhe na / brnab sems ni /
translated: and have the result of suffering?

analyzed: pha rol gyi rdzas rnams dang / pha rol gyi nor rnams dang / pha rol gyi yo byad rnams mthong na brnab sems skyed par byed de /
translated: Covetousness is when, upon seeing the wealth, possessions, or property of others, one gives rise to covetousness.

analyzed: kye ma 'di dag bdag la yod kyang ji ma rung snyam ste /

analyzed: brnab sems ma spangs pa yin no // gnod sems kyis sdang bar byed pa ni /

analyzed: kye ma sems can 'di dag brgyab kyang rung ngo // bsad kyang rung ngo // nyams par byas kyang rung ngo //

analyzed: mi rigs par nyon mongs par byas kyang rung ngo snyam pa ni /

analyzed: gnod sems kyi sdang ba ma spangs pa yin no //

original: log par lta ba ni /🔽phyin ci log tu lta zhing 'di ltar lta la 'di skad du smra ste /
analyzed: log par lta ba ni / phyin ci log tu lta zhing 'di ltar lta la 'di skad du smra ste /
translated: He thinks, There is no giving,

analyzed: sbyin pa med do // mchod sbyin med do //
translated: There is no offering,

original: sbyin sreg med do //🔽legs par spyad pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin sreg med do // legs par spyad pa med do //
translated: There is no sacrifice,

original: nyes par spyad pa med do //
analyzed: nyes par spyad pa med do //
translated: There are no good or bad actions,

analyzed: legs par spyad pa dang nyes par spyad pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med do //
translated: There is no result or ripening of good or bad actions,

original: 'jig rten 'di med do //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di med do //
translated: There is no this world,

original: 'jig rten pha rol med do //🔽pha med do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol med do // pha med do //
translated: There is no other world,🔽There is no mother,

original: ma med do //
analyzed: ma med do //
translated: There is no father,

original: sems can skye ba med do //🔽'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par song ba yang @358b dag par zhugs pa gang 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol tshe 'di nyid la bdag nyid kyis mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas khong du chud de bdag cag gi🔽skye ba zad do //🔽tshangs par spyad pa bsten to //🔽bya ba byas so //
analyzed: sems can skye ba med do // 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par song ba yang @358b dag par zhugs pa gang 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol tshe 'di nyid la bdag nyid kyis mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas khong du chud de bdag cag gi skye ba zad do // tshangs par spyad pa bsten to // bya ba byas so //
translated: Sentient beings are unborn.

original: lus kyi las mi dge ba spangs nas lus kyi las dge ba sgom par byed do //🔽ngag gi las mi dge ba spangs nas ngag gi las dge ba sgom par byed do //
analyzed: lus kyi las mi dge ba spangs nas lus kyi las dge ba sgom par byed do // ngag gi las mi dge ba spangs nas ngag gi las dge ba sgom par byed do //
translated: Having abandoned unwholesome bodily actions, they cultivate wholesome bodily actions.🔽Having abandoned unwholesome verbal actions, they cultivate wholesome verbal actions.

original: yid kyi las mi dge ba spangs nas yid kyi las dge ba sgom par byed do //
analyzed: yid kyi las mi dge ba spangs nas yid kyi las dge ba sgom par byed do //
translated: Having abandoned unwholesome mental actions, they cultivate wholesome mental actions.

original: de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa /
analyzed: de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa /
translated: With a mind endowed with loving-kindness,

original: gcugs med pa /
analyzed: gcugs med pa /
translated: without enmity,

original: gnod pa med pa /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa /
translated: without ill will,🔽vast,

original: rgya che ba /🔽chen por gyur pa /
analyzed: rgya che ba / chen por gyur pa /
translated: extensive,

original: tshad med pas phyogs gcig tu mos par byas te khyab par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: tshad med pas phyogs gcig tu mos par byas te khyab par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: immeasurable, they abide having pervaded one direction with a mind full of loving-kindness.

original: phyogs gnyis pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: They do the same with the second direction,

original: gsum pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: gsum pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: the third direction,

original: bzhi pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bzhi pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: and the fourth direction.

original: steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad du yang de bzhin te /
analyzed: steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad du yang de bzhin te /
translated: Like this, above, below, across, and everywhere,

original: 'jig rten 'di thams cad byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis @359a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di thams cad byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis @359a *//
translated: they abide having pervaded the entire world with a mind full of loving-kindness,

original: mos par byas te khyab par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: mos par byas te khyab par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: vast, extensive, immeasurable,🔽without enmity, without ill will.

original: de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: He thinks like this:

original: bdag gi sems 'di sngon ni /
analyzed: bdag gi sems 'di sngon ni /
translated: ‘Previously, my mind

original: chung ngur gyur pa las ma bsgoms da ni; bdag gis sems 'di tshad med cing rgya che ba la bsgoms pa yin no snyam mo //
analyzed: chung ngur gyur pa las ma bsgoms da ni; bdag gis sems 'di tshad med cing rgya che ba la bsgoms pa yin no snyam mo //
translated: was small, but now I have cultivated it to be immeasurable and vast.’

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Bhikṣus,

original: 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi sems ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi sems ni /
translated: the mind of the noble śrāvakas

original: tshad med cing rgya che la shin tu bsgoms pa yin te /
analyzed: tshad med cing rgya che la shin tu bsgoms pa yin te /
translated: is immeasurable, vast, and well cultivated.

original: de ni / sngon tshad yod par gyur pa gang yin pa des de bkri bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / sngon tshad yod par gyur pa gang yin pa des de bkri bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which was previously limited does not lead them.

original: de der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not remain there.

original: de der bgrang bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de der bgrang bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not count it.

original: dge slong dag /🔽gal te byis pa gzhon nu'am /
analyzed: dge slong dag / gal te byis pa gzhon nu'am /
translated: Bhikṣus,🔽if a child,

original: gzhon nu ma yang rung ste /🔽thog ma nas byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na yang ci lus sam /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma yang rung ste / thog ma nas byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na yang ci lus sam /
translated: a boy, or a girl

original: ngag gam / yid kyis sdig pa'i las byed par 'gyur ram /🔽btsun pa / de ni /
analyzed: ngag gam / yid kyis sdig pa'i las byed par 'gyur ram / btsun pa / de ni /
translated: cultivates the samādhi of loving kindness from the beginning, will they commit evil deeds with their body, speech, or mind?”

original: ma lags so //
analyzed: ma lags so //
translated: “No, they will not, Bhadanta.”

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: “Bhikṣus,

original: legs so legs so //
analyzed: legs so legs so //
translated: excellent, excellent!”

original: byams pa'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin ni /🔽skyes pa yang rung /
analyzed: byams pa'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin ni / skyes pa yang rung /
translated: The meditative absorption of loving-kindness🔽is to be cultivated by men,

original: bud med kyang rung /
analyzed: bud med kyang rung /
translated: by women,

original: khyim pa yang rung /
analyzed: khyim pa yang rung /
translated: by householders,

original: rab tu 'byung ba yang rung bas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'byung ba yang rung bas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and by renunciants.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: skyes pa yang rung /🔽bud med kyang rung /
analyzed: skyes pa yang rung / bud med kyang rung /
translated: Because neither men🔽nor women,

original: khyim pa yang rung /
analyzed: khyim pa yang rung /
translated: neither householders

original: rab tu tu byung ba yang rung bas ni /
analyzed: rab tu tu byung ba yang rung bas ni /
translated: nor renunciants

original: lus 'di khyer te 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus 'di khyer te 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: will be able to take this body with them when they go.

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Monks,

original: mi ni / sems kyi rgyu las 'byung ba yin te /🔽sems la rten cing sems @359b la rag las la /
analyzed: mi ni / sems kyi rgyu las 'byung ba yin te / sems la rten cing sems @359b la rag las la /
translated: humans are produced by the mind.

original: sems la brten nas dbang byed do //
analyzed: sems la brten nas dbang byed do //
translated: They are supported by the mind, dependent on the mind, and the mind controls them.

original: lus 'dis sngon sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas shing bsags pa mi dge ba /
analyzed: lus 'dis sngon sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas shing bsags pa mi dge ba /
translated: Whatever unwholesome, unbeneficial actions they have done and accumulated with this body,🔽which are painful,

original: sdug bsngal skyed pa /🔽rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'dir myong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sdug bsngal skyed pa / rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'dir myong bar 'gyur te /
translated: with painful results,🔽all of that will be experienced right here.

original: tshe 'di nyid la myong bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la myong bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: They will be experienced in this very life.

original: skyes pa'i 'og dang ldan grangs gzhan la ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes pa'i 'og dang ldan grangs gzhan la ma yin no //
translated: and not to others.

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Bhikṣus,

original: de ltar byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ni /
translated: thus, the cultivation of the meditative absorption of loving kindness

original: gal te gong du rtogs par ma byas na yang phyir mi 'ong bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te gong du rtogs par ma byas na yang phyir mi 'ong bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: if not brought to full realization, will result in abiding as a non-returner.

original: dge slong dag /
analyzed: dge slong dag /
translated: Bhikṣus,

original: gzhan yang thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos ni /
translated: further, the noble disciple who is endowed with learning

original: lus kyi las mi dge ba spangs nas zhes bya ba nas rgyas par snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa yang de bzhin du brjod par bya /
analyzed: lus kyi las mi dge ba spangs nas zhes bya ba nas rgyas par snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa yang de bzhin du brjod par bya /
translated: having abandoned unwholesome actions of the body, and so on, in detail, up to being endowed with compassion, endowed with joy, and endowed with equanimity.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: This is what was said.

original: ched du bya ba de la sems pa'i las dang / bsams pa'i las dang gnyis yod de /
analyzed: ched du bya ba de la sems pa'i las dang / bsams pa'i las dang gnyis yod de /
translated: There are two types of action: the action of intention and the action of volition.

original: sems pa'i las gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems pa'i las gang zhe na /
translated: What is the action of intention?

original: smras pa / sems pa dang / mngon par sems pa dang / sems par gyur pa dang / sems par gtogs pa dang / sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: smras pa / sems pa dang / mngon par sems pa dang / sems par gyur pa dang / sems par gtogs pa dang / sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: He replied, “It is the intention, the strong intention, the intention that has arisen, that which is associated with the intention, the mental formation, and the mental action.

original: sems pa'i las zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems pa'i las zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the action of intention.

original: bsam pa'i las gang zhe na /
analyzed: bsam pa'i las gang zhe na /
translated: What is the action of volition?

original: smras pa / bsam pa'i lus kyi las dang / bsam pa'i ngag gi las 'di ni /
analyzed: smras pa / bsam pa'i lus kyi las dang / bsam pa'i ngag gi las 'di ni /
translated: He replied, “The action of the body and the action of speech that are willed.

original: bsam pa'i las zhes bya'o //🔽de la sems pa'i @360a *//
analyzed: bsam pa'i las zhes bya'o // de la sems pa'i @360a *//
translated: This is called the action of volition.

original: las ni; 'das pa yang yod do //
analyzed: las ni; 'das pa yang yod do //
translated: Among them, the action of intention exists in the past,

original: ma 'ongs pa yang yod do //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa yang yod do //
translated: exists in the future,

original: da ltar byung ba yang yod do //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba yang yod do //
translated: and exists in the present.

original: sems pa'i las 'das pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems pa'i las 'das pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the action of intention in the past?

original: smras pa / sems pa gang skyes pa dang / yang dag par skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / grub pa dang / mngon par grub pa dang / yang dag par grub pa dang / byung bar gyur nas mngon par 'das pa dang / zad pa dang /
analyzed: smras pa / sems pa gang skyes pa dang / yang dag par skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / grub pa dang / mngon par grub pa dang / yang dag par grub pa dang / byung bar gyur nas mngon par 'das pa dang / zad pa dang /
translated: He replied, “The intention that has arisen, that has fully arisen, that has occurred, that has been accomplished, that has been fully accomplished, that has arisen and has passed away, that has ceased, that has departed, that has been transformed.

original: 'gags pa dang / bral ba dang / rnam par gyur pa dang / 'das pa dang / 'das pa'i char gtogs pa dang / 'das pa'i dus kyis bsdus pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'gags pa dang / bral ba dang / rnam par gyur pa dang / 'das pa dang / 'das pa'i char gtogs pa dang / 'das pa'i dus kyis bsdus pa 'di ni /
translated: The past is that which has ceased, is separated, has changed, is passed, belongs to the past, and is included in the past.

original: sems pa'i las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: sems pa'i las 'das pa'o //
translated: This is the past of the karma of intention.

original: sems pa'i las ma 'ongs pa gang zhe na /🔽smras pa / sems pa'i las gang ma skyes pa dang / yang dag par ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yang dag par ma byung ba dang / da dung ma phyin pa dang / mngon par ma grub pa dang / ma byung ba dang /
analyzed: sems pa'i las ma 'ongs pa gang zhe na / smras pa / sems pa'i las gang ma skyes pa dang / yang dag par ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / yang dag par ma byung ba dang / da dung ma phyin pa dang / mngon par ma grub pa dang / ma byung ba dang /
translated: What is the future of the karma of intention?

original: ma 'ongs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i char gtogs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis bsdus pa 'di ni /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i char gtogs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis bsdus pa 'di ni /
translated: It is that which has not yet arisen, not fully arisen, not occurred, not fully occurred, not yet come, not manifested, not present, not present at the time, not included in the present, and not included in the present time.

original: sems pa'i las ma 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: sems pa'i las ma 'ongs pa'o //
translated: This is the future of the karma of intention.

original: sems pa'i las da ltar byung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems pa'i las da ltar byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the present of the karma of intention?

original: smras pa / sems pa gang skyes pa dang / yang dag par skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / yang dag par byung ba dang / phyin zin pa dang / byung bar gyur pa dang / gnas pa dang / rnam par ma gyur pa dang /
analyzed: smras pa / sems pa gang skyes pa dang / yang dag par skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / yang dag par byung ba dang / phyin zin pa dang / byung bar gyur pa dang / gnas pa dang / rnam par ma gyur pa dang /
translated: He replied, “It is the intention that has arisen, has fully arisen, has occurred, has fully occurred, has been completed, has come about, is present, has not changed,

original: da ltar 'dug pa nas rgyas par sbyar te /🔽@360b 'di ni; sems pa'i las da ltar byung ba'o //
analyzed: da ltar 'dug pa nas rgyas par sbyar te / @360b 'di ni; sems pa'i las da ltar byung ba'o //
translated: and is present in detail.🔽This is the present mental action.

original: de la sems pa'i las ni /🔽dge ba yang yod /
analyzed: de la sems pa'i las ni / dge ba yang yod /
translated: “What is mental action?🔽It is virtuous,

original: mi dge ba yang yod /
analyzed: mi dge ba yang yod /
translated: nonvirtuous,

original: lung du ma bstan pa yang yod do //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa yang yod do //
translated: and indeterminate.

original: sems pa'i las dge ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems pa'i las dge ba gang zhe na /
translated: “What is virtuous mental action?

original: smras pa / dge ba'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the intention that is associated with virtuous mental activity, and so on up to the mental formation and mental action.

original: ji lta zhe na; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na; 'di lta ste /
translated: How is that?

original: chags pa med pa dang / sdang ba med pa dang / rmongs pa med pas tshul bzhin so sor brtags nas mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang / rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang / snas dri rnams bsnams pa dang / lces ro rnams myong ba dang /
analyzed: chags pa med pa dang / sdang ba med pa dang / rmongs pa med pas tshul bzhin so sor brtags nas mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang / rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang / snas dri rnams bsnams pa dang / lces ro rnams myong ba dang /
translated: Having properly investigated with a mind free of attachment, aversion, and delusion, the mind that sees forms with the eyes, hears sounds with the ears, smells scents with the nose, tastes flavors with the tongue,

original: lus kyis reg bya rnams reg pa dang / yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i sems gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: lus kyis reg bya rnams reg pa dang / yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i sems gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: touches touchable objects with the body, and cognizes mental objects with the mind, up to the mental activity and mental action,

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: this is called virtuous intention.

original: gzhan yang yongs su zin pa ma yin pas bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa bzhi sgom pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: gzhan yang yongs su zin pa ma yin pas bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa bzhi sgom pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: Moreover, the intention to cultivate the four concentrations and four formless [absorptions] without being fully grasped, up to the mental activity and mental action,

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: this is called virtuous intention.

original: gzhan yang srog gcod pa spangs pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / @361a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang srog gcod pa spangs pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / @361a *//
translated: Furthermore, it is the mind that is concomitant with the mental activity that is endowed with the avoidance of killing, the avoidance of taking what is not given, the avoidance of sexual misconduct, the avoidance of false speech,🔽the avoidance of divisive speech, the avoidance of harsh speech, the avoidance of frivolous speech, the avoidance of covetousness, the avoidance of malice, and the avoidance of wrong views, and it is the mental activity that is concomitant with right view, and it is the mind that is concomitant with the mental activity that is endowed with the avoidance of killing, the avoidance of taking what is not given, the avoidance of sexual misconduct, the avoidance of false speech,🔽the avoidance of divisive speech, the avoidance of harsh speech, the avoidance of frivolous speech, the avoidance of covetousness, the avoidance of malice, and the avoidance of wrong views, and it is the mental activity that is concomitant with right view, and it is the mind that is concomitant with the mental activity that is endowed with the avoidance of killing, the avoidance of taking what is not given, the avoidance of sexual misconduct, the avoidance of false speech,

original: phra ma dang / tshig rtsub pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems spangs pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /🔽yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /🔽'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o /
analyzed: phra ma dang / tshig rtsub pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems spangs pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te / 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o /
translated: the avoidance of divisive speech, the avoidance of harsh speech, the avoidance of frivolous speech, the avoidance of covetousness, the avoidance of malice, and the avoidance of wrong views, and it is the mental activity that is concomitant with right view, and it is the mind that is concomitant with the mental activity that is endowed with the avoidance of killing, the avoidance of taking what is not given, the avoidance of sexual misconduct, the avoidance of false speech,🔽the avoidance of divisive speech, the avoidance of harsh speech, the avoidance of frivolous speech, the avoidance of covetousness, the avoidance of malice, and the avoidance of wrong views, and it is the mental activity that is concomitant with right view, and it is the mind that is concomitant with the mental activity that is endowed with the avoidance of killing, the avoidance of taking what is not given, the avoidance of sexual misconduct, the avoidance of false speech,

original: gzhan yang khro ba med pa dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'chab pa med pa dang / 'tshig pa med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / g-yo med pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang khro ba med pa dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'chab pa med pa dang / 'tshig pa med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / g-yo med pa dang /
translated: the avoidance of divisive speech, the avoidance of harsh speech, the avoidance of frivolous speech, the avoidance of covetousness, the avoidance of malice, and the avoidance of wrong views, and it is the mental activity that is concomitant with right view, and it is the mind that is concomitant with the mental activity that is endowed with the avoidance of killing, the avoidance of taking what is not given, the avoidance of sexual misconduct, the avoidance of false speech,🔽the avoidance of divisive speech, the avoidance

original: ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the mental factor that is concomitant with the mental faculty that is associated with shame and embarrassment, and so on up to: the mental factor that is concomitant with the mental faculty that is associated with the mental action of volition.

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called virtuous intention.

original: gzhan yang gsong por smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / sngon du ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /🔽yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gsong por smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / sngon du ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: Moreover, it is the mental factor that is concomitant with the mental faculty that is associated with the mental attention of speaking pleasantly, bowing, rising up, joining palms, and bowing down, and so on up to: the mental factor that is concomitant with the mental faculty that is associated with the mental action of volition.

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called virtuous intention.

original: gzhan yang sbyin bdag sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyin bdag sbyin pa'am /
translated: Moreover, it is the mental factor that is concomitant with the mental faculty that is associated with the mental attention of a donor who gives a gift,

original: bsod nams dag byed pa'am /
analyzed: bsod nams dag byed pa'am /
translated: or who makes merit,

original: gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa'am /
translated: or who observes the purificatory fast,🔽or who observes moral discipline,

original: tshul khrims yang dag par @361b blangs te 'dug pa'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims yang dag par @361b blangs te 'dug pa'am /
translated: or who is a bodhisattva,🔽or who is a tathāgata, and so on up to: the mental factor that is concomitant with the mental faculty that is associated with the mental action of volition.

original: dad pa'i sems kyi rang gi lag bdar byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: dad pa'i sems kyi rang gi lag bdar byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the mental factor that is the activity of the mind, the mental factor that is the action of the mind, and the mental factor that is the activity of the mind and the action of the mind.

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //🔽gzhan yang dge ba'i yid la byed pas sdug bsngal bar yid la byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o // gzhan yang dge ba'i yid la byed pas sdug bsngal bar yid la byed pa'am /
translated: This is called virtuous intention.🔽Moreover, it is the intention that is associated with virtuous mental activity,

original: kun 'byung ba la kun 'byung ba'am /🔽'gog pa la 'gog pa'am /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba la kun 'byung ba'am / 'gog pa la 'gog pa'am /
translated: the intention that is associated with the mental activity of the origin of suffering,🔽the intention that is associated with the mental activity of the cessation of suffering,

original: lam la lam du yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: lam la lam du yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: and the intention that is associated with the mental activity of the path.

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called virtuous intention.

original: mi dge ba'i sems pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i sems pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is nonvirtuous intention?🔽It is the intention that is associated with nonvirtuous mental activity,

original: smras pa / mi dge ba'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: smras pa / mi dge ba'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: the mental factor that is the activity of the mind, and the mental factor that is the action of the mind.

original: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called nonvirtuous intention.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?🔽It is like this:

original: 'di ltar chags pa'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar chags pa'am /
translated: without attachment,

original: sdang ba'am / rmongs pas tshul gzhan ma yin pa dang / so sor ma btags par mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: sdang ba'am / rmongs pas tshul gzhan ma yin pa dang / so sor ma btags par mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: aversion, or confusion, without a different mode, and without being specified, when the eye sees forms, up to when the mind cognizes phenomena, whatever is the intention, up to the mental formation and mental action,

original: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: this is called nonvirtuous intention.

original: gzhan yang srog gcod pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa @362a *//

translated: Moreover, it is associated with the attention concomitant with killing, stealing, sexual misconduct,

original: dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsob po dang / tshig khyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /

translated: and the intention associated with the mental activity of possessing lying, slander, harsh words, frivolous speech, covetousness, ill will, and wrong views, up to the mental activity of the volition and

original: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: the mental karma.

original: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called unwholesome intention.

original: gzhan yang khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sgyu dang / g-yo dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sgyu dang / g-yo dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
translated: Moreover, the intention associated with the mental activity of possessing anger, resentment, hypocrisy, spite, jealousy, stinginess, deceit, guile, shamelessness, and lack of conscience, up to the mental activity of the volition and

original: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: the mental karma.

original: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called unwholesome intention.

original: gzhan yang lag pa dang / khu tshur dang / thal lcag gis bsnun pa dang / yal ga dang / lcug mas gnod par bya ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang lag pa dang / khu tshur dang / thal lcag gis bsnun pa dang / yal ga dang / lcug mas gnod par bya ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
translated: It is also intention concomitant with attention associated with the act of striking with the hand, fist or palm, or the act of harming with a branch or a whip.

original: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: Furthermore, it is the intention associated with the attention that is associated with the wish to harm by means of hands, fists, slaps, branches, or whips, and so on, up to the mental activity that is associated with the mental action.

original: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //🔽gzhan yang mi dge ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas dkris pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas @362b sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o // gzhan yang mi dge ba'i kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas dkris pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas @362b sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
translated: This is called unwholesome intention.

original: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: Furthermore, it is the intention associated with the unwholesome fetters, bonds, latent tendencies, secondary afflictions, and entanglements, and so on, up to the mental activity that is associated with the mental action.

original: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called unwholesome intention.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is neutral intention?

original: smras pa / lung du ma bstan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: smras pa / lung du ma bstan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: He said, “It is the volition associated with a neutral mental activity, up to the mental activity that produces the mind and the activity of the mind.

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called neutral volition.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is it?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽dge ba'i sems kyang ma yin /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / dge ba'i sems kyang ma yin /
translated: It is like this:

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyang ma yin pa rang bzhin du gnas pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyang ma yin pa rang bzhin du gnas pa /
translated: It is neither a virtuous mind nor a defiled mind. It is a mind that is naturally settled,

original: spyod lam la zhugs pas mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba nas yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: spyod lam la zhugs pas mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba nas yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: and it is the volition, up to the mental activity that produces the mind and the activity of the mind, of one who is engaged in daily activities, from the eyes seeing forms up to the mind being conscious of mental phenomena.

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called neutral volition.

original: gzhan yang yongs su zin pa'i sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa bzhi sgom pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: gzhan yang yongs su zin pa'i sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa bzhi sgom pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: Moreover, it is the intention to cultivate the four concentrations and four formless absorptions with a fully appropriated mind, up to the mental formation and mental activity.

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa zhes bya'o //🔽gzhan yang lung du ma bstan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu dkris pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems @363a *//
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa zhes bya'o // gzhan yang lung du ma bstan pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu dkris pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems @363a *//
translated: This is called indeterminate intention.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: Moreover, it is the intention concomitant with indeterminate fetters, bonds, latent tendencies, secondary afflictions, and entanglements, up to the mental formation and mental activity.

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called indeterminate intention.

original: dge ba'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa dang / mi dge ba la dmigs pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa yang yod dam /
analyzed: dge ba'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa dang / mi dge ba la dmigs pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa yang yod dam /
translated: Is there virtuous intention that takes virtue, non-virtue, and the indeterminate as its object?

original: smras pa / dge ba la dmigs pa yang yod do //
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba la dmigs pa yang yod do //
translated: He replied: “There are those that focus on the wholesome.

original: mi dge ba la dmigs pa yang yod do //
analyzed: mi dge ba la dmigs pa yang yod do //
translated: There are those that focus on the unwholesome.

original: lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa yang yod do //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa yang yod do //
translated: There are those that focus on the neutral.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba la dmigs pa yang yod do //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba la dmigs pa yang yod do //
translated: There are those that focus on the wholesome and the unwholesome.

original: dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa yang yod do //
analyzed: dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa yang yod do //
translated: There are those that focus on the wholesome and the neutral.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa yang yod do //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa yang yod do //
translated: There are those that focus on the wholesome, the unwholesome, and the neutral.

original: dge ba ji lta ba bzhin du mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa yang de dang 'dra bar yod par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dge ba ji lta ba bzhin du mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa yang de dang 'dra bar yod par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Just as with the wholesome, it should be stated that there are those that focus on the unwholesome and the neutral.

original: dge ba'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the wholesome volition that focuses on the wholesome?”

original: smras pa / dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba'i sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba'i sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
translated: He replied: “The wholesome bodily and verbal actions, the wholesome mind and mental factors, the formations not associated with the mind, and the unconditioned phenomena—these are the wholesome phenomena that are the object of wholesome volition.

original: rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba; 'bras bu yod pa rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las @363b kyi bar du sbyar ba dang /🔽yang na chos de dag gi phan yon dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas yid la byed cing chos 'di dag ni /🔽dge ba ste /🔽skyes bu dam pas rang gis rtogs pa /
analyzed: rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba; 'bras bu yod pa rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las @363b kyi bar du sbyar ba dang / yang na chos de dag gi phan yon dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas yid la byed cing chos 'di dag ni / dge ba ste / skyes bu dam pas rang gis rtogs pa /
translated: “This is the cause, this is how it arises, this is the result, this is the ripening.”🔽Or, they may be mindful of the benefits of those phenomena.🔽“These phenomena are virtuous.🔽They are realized by holy beings.🔽

original: sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang dam pa rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis bsngags pa ste /🔽zin cing yang dag par zin na bdag la gnod par mi 'gyur zhing /🔽gzhan la yang gnod par mi 'gyur la /🔽gnyis ga la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te /

original: shes rab skye bar 'gyur ba dang / phongs par 'gyur ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa ma yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' pa 'gyur ba yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab skye bar 'gyur ba dang / phongs par 'gyur ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa ma yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' pa 'gyur ba yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
translated: It is the intention to think, ‘This is the cause for the arising of wisdom, it is not conducive to being destitute, and it leads to nirvāṇa.’

original: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the mental activity that is associated with the mind and mental factors.

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the virtuous intention that focuses on virtue.

original: dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the virtuous intention that focuses on nonvirtue?

original: smras pa / mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: smras pa / mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
translated: It is the nonvirtuous actions of body and speech, the nonvirtuous phenomena of mind and mental factors, the formations that are not associated with a nonvirtuous mind, and the phenomena that are the objects of those.

original: rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba'i 'bras bu yod pa rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las @364a *//🔽kyi bar du sbyar ba dang / yang na chos de dag gi nyes dmigs dang ldan pa yid la byed cing chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: rgyu dang bcas pa las byung ba'i 'bras bu yod pa rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las @364a *// kyi bar du sbyar ba dang / yang na chos de dag gi nyes dmigs dang ldan pa yid la byed cing chos 'di dag ni /
translated: “The result that arises from a cause is existent and has a ripening.”🔽“These phenomena are unwholesome,

original: mi dge ba yin te /
analyzed: mi dge ba yin te /
translated: condemned by the noble ones,

original: skyes bu dam pa yin pas rang gis rtogs pa /
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa yin pas rang gis rtogs pa /
translated: realized by the noble ones,

original: sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang / dam pa rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis smad pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang / dam pa rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis smad pa ste /
translated: and despised by the Buddhas, the Buddhas’ disciples, the holy ones, and the noble ones.

original: zin cing yang dag par zin na bdag la yang gnod par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: zin cing yang dag par zin na bdag la yang gnod par 'gyur zhing /
translated: When they are grasped and fully grasped, they harm oneself,

original: gzhan la yang gnod par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gzhan la yang gnod par 'gyur la /
translated: harm others,

original: gnyi ga la yang gnod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang gnod par 'gyur te /
translated: and harm both.

original: shes rab 'gag par 'gyur ba dang / phongs par 'gyur ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa /
analyzed: shes rab 'gag par 'gyur ba dang / phongs par 'gyur ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa /
translated: They lead to the cessation of wisdom and to misfortune.

original: mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: “I will not attain nirvana.”

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the virtuous intention that focuses on the unwholesome.

original: dge ba'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the virtuous intention that focuses on the indeterminate?

original: smras pa / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: smras pa / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
translated: It is the intention that thinks, “The indeterminate form, the indeterminate mind and mental factors, the indeterminate formations not associated with the mind, and these phenomena

original: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
analyzed: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
translated: are not produced from a cause.

original: 'bras bu med pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa /
translated: They are not a result.

original: rnam par smin pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa med pa yin no //
translated: They do not have a ripening.

original: snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par @364b 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par @364b 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: ” This is the intention that thinks in this way, and it is connected with the mental activity of directing the mind and with the activity of the mind.

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the wholesome intention that focuses on the wholesome and indeterminate.

original: dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the wholesome intention that focuses on the unwholesome and wholesome?🔽” It is the intention that is applied to the wholesome and unwholesome bodily,🔽verbal, and mental actions, and to the wholesome and unwholesome mental factors, and to the formations associated with the wholesome and unwholesome mind.

original: smras pa; dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang /🔽chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: smras pa; dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
translated: It is the intention that is applied to the wholesome and unwholesome phenomena,

original: rgyu las byung ba /
analyzed: rgyu las byung ba /
translated: which are the result of causes,

original: 'bras bu yod pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu yod pa /
translated: which have results,

original: rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: and which have karmic ripening.

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the wholesome intention that focuses on the wholesome and unwholesome.

original: dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the wholesome intention that focuses on the wholesome and indeterminate?

original: smras pa / dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang /
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang /
translated: He said, “The virtuous actions of body, speech, and mind, the virtuous mental factors, the virtuous formations not associated with the mind, the neutral forms, the neutral mental factors,🔽and the neutral formations not associated with the mind.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
translated: These phenomena

original: rgyu las byung ba /
analyzed: rgyu las byung ba /
translated: are caused,

original: 'bras bu yod pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu yod pa /
translated: have results,

original: rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du @365a *//
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du @365a *//
translated: and have karmic ripening.”

original: de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: In this way, the intention that is directed toward these phenomena is connected with the mental activity that forms the mind and the mental activity that is mental karma.

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the virtuous intention that focuses on the virtuous and neutral.

original: dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the wholesome intention that focuses on the unwholesome and neutral?

original: smras pa / mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang /
analyzed: smras pa / mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang /
translated: It is the unwholesome bodily and verbal actions, the unwholesome mental factors and mental states, the formations not associated with the mind that are unwholesome, and the form that is neutral.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni; rgyu las byung ba /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni; rgyu las byung ba /
translated: It is the neutral mental factors and mental states, the formations not associated with the mind that are neutral, and the phenomena that are neutral.

original: 'bras bu yod pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu yod pa /
translated: It is the intention that thinks, ‘These phenomena arise from causes, have results,

original: rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: and have karmic ripening,’ and it is the mental activity that is the mental action of directing the mind toward an object.

original: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the wholesome intention that focuses on the unwholesome and the neutral.

original: dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the wholesome intention that focuses on the wholesome, the unwholesome, and the neutral?

original: smras pa / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems @365b las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang /

translated: It is the wholesome and unwholesome bodily and vocal actions, the wholesome and unwholesome mental factors, the wholesome and unwholesome mental activities, the wholesome and unwholesome mental states, the wholesome and unwholesome formations not associated with the mind,🔽the neutral bodily and vocal actions, the neutral mental factors, the neutral mental activities, the neutral mental states, the neutral formations not associated with the mind, the neutral form, the neutral mental factors, the neutral formations not associated with the mind, and the neutral unconditioned factors.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /🔽rgyu las byung ba /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni / rgyu las byung ba /

translated: The intention is the mental factor that thinks, “This is wholesome and has a ripening.”

analyzed: 'di ni / dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is wholesome intention that focuses on wholesome, unwholesome, and neutral objects.

original: mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is unwholesome intention that focuses on wholesome objects?

analyzed: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
translated: these are unwholesome phenomena that arise without a cause,

original: 'bras bu med pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa /

translated: The thought, I will attain nirvana, is applied to the mental activity, the mental attention, the mental placing, the mental directing, the mental focusing, the mental fixity, the mental nondistraction, the mental pliability, the mental one-pointedness, the mental abiding, the mental samādhi, the mental equipoise, the mental engagement, the mental application, the mental formation, and the mental action.🔽This is called unwholesome intention that focuses on the wholesome.

translated: What is unwholesome intention that focuses on the unwholesome?

translated: It is the unwholesome bodily action, the unwholesome verbal action, the unwholesome mind and mental factors, the unwholesome formations not associated with the mind, and the unwholesome phenomena.

analyzed: chos 'di dag ni /
translated: They think, “These phenomena

analyzed: skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas rang gis rtogs pa /
