analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas @366b kyi nyan thos rnams dang / dam pa rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis smad pa ste /
translated: They are despised by the buddhas, the buddhas’ disciples, the holy beings, and the noble beings.

original: zin cing yang dag zin na bdag la gnod par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: zin cing yang dag zin na bdag la gnod par 'gyur zhing /
translated: When they are grasped and fully grasped, they harm oneself,

original: gzhan la yang gnod pa 'gyur la /
analyzed: gzhan la yang gnod pa 'gyur la /
translated: they harm others,

original: gnyi ga la yang gnod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang gnod par 'gyur te /
translated: and they harm both.

original: shes rab 'gag par 'gyur ba dang / phongs par 'gyur pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab 'gag par 'gyur ba dang / phongs par 'gyur pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
translated: It is the intention to think, ‘This is the cause of the cessation of wisdom, the cause of being in accord with the side of poverty, and the cause of not attaining nirvāṇa.’

original: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the mental activity that is associated with the mental activity of directing the mind and mental processes.

original: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is nonvirtuous intention that focuses on nonvirtue.

original: mi dge ba'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is nonvirtuous intention that focuses on that which is ethically neutral?

original: smras pa / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: smras pa / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
translated: It is the ethically neutral form, the ethically neutral mind and mental factors, the ethically neutral formations that are not associated with the mind, and the ethically neutral unconditioned phenomena.

original: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
analyzed: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
translated: These phenomena are not produced by causes.

original: 'bras bu med pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa /
translated: They are not results.

original: rnam par smin pa med pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa med pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: “This is the karma of non-virtuous volition that is unobservable.”

original: 'di ni; mi dge ba'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //🔽mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni; mi dge ba'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o // mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: This is the non-virtuous volition that is focused on the neutral.

original: smras pa / dge ba dang mi dge @367a *//
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba dang mi dge @367a *//
translated: “What is the non-virtuous volition that is focused on the virtuous and the non-virtuous?”

original: ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
translated: “The virtuous and non-virtuous volitions of body and speech, the virtuous and non-virtuous mental factors, the virtuous and non-virtuous volitions that are not associated with the mind, and the phenomena that are not associated with the mind—

original: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
analyzed: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
translated: these phenomena are not arisen from a cause.

original: 'bras bu med pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa /
translated: They are not results.

original: rnam par smin pa med pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa med pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: This is the intention, the mental activity, and the mental action that is associated with it.

original: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o; ;mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /🔽smras pa / dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang /
analyzed: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o; ;mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na / smras pa / dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang /
translated: “What is unwholesome intention that focuses on wholesome and unwholesome objects?”

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /🔽rgyu med pa las byung ba /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /🔽rgyu med pa las byung ba /
translated: “It is wholesome bodily and verbal actions, wholesome thoughts and mental factors, wholesome formations not associated with thoughts, unwholesome and wholesome physical forms, unwholesome and wholesome thoughts and mental factors, unwholesome and wholesome formations not associated with thoughts, unwholesome and wholesome physical forms, unwholesome and wholesome compositional factors, unwholesome and wholesome sensory elements, unwholesome and wholesome sense bases, unwholesome and wholesome dependent originations, unwholesome and wholesome causal conditions, unwholesome and wholesome fruits, unwholesome and wholesome results, unwholesome and wholesome causes and results, unwholesome and wholesome causes, unwholesome and wholesome results, unwholesome and wholesome causes and results, unwholesome and wholesome karmic maturations, and unwholesome and wholesome non-karmic maturations.🔽“What is unwholesome intention that focuses on wholesome and neutral objects?”🔽“It is wholesome bodily and verbal actions, wholesome thoughts and mental factors, wholesome formations not associated with thoughts, neutral physical forms, neutral thoughts and mental factors, neutral formations not associated with thoughts, neutral compositional factors, neutral sensory elements, neutral sense bases, neutral dependent originations, neutral causal conditions, neutral fruits, neutral results, neutral causes and results, neutral causes, neutral results, neutral causes and results, neutral karmic maturations, and neutral non-karmic maturations.🔽“What is unwholesome intention that focuses on neutral objects?”

original: 'bras bu med pa; rnam par smin pa med pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa; rnam par smin pa med pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: “This action is without result, without karmic ripening.”

original: 'di @367b ni; mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di @367b ni; mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the wholesome intention that focuses on the unwholesome and the indeterminate.

original: mi dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the unwholesome intention that focuses on the unwholesome and the indeterminate?”

original: smras pa / mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang /
analyzed: smras pa / mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang /
translated: It is the unwholesome bodily and verbal actions, the unwholesome mind and mental factors, the unwholesome formations not associated with the mind, and the indeterminate form.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
translated: It is also the indeterminate mind and mental factors, the indeterminate formations not associated with the mind, and the phenomena that are not related to the mind.

original: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
analyzed: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
translated: It is not produced without a cause.

original: 'bras bu med pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa /
translated: It does not have a result.🔽It does not have a ripening.”

original: rnam par smin pa med pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa med pa yin no snyam du de ltar yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: This is the intention, the mental activity, the mental attention, the mental placing, the mental directing, the mental fixation, the mental investigation, the mental consideration, the mental application, the mental formation, and the mental action of one who thinks in this way.

original: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the unwholesome intention that focuses on the unwholesome and the neutral.

original: mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the unwholesome intention that focuses on the wholesome, the unwholesome, and the neutral?

original: smras pa / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang /
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang /
translated: It is the wholesome and unwholesome bodily and verbal actions, the wholesome and unwholesome mental factors that are associated with the mind, the wholesome and unwholesome formations that are not associated with the mind,

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i @368a *//
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i @368a *//
translated: the neutral form,

original: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / chos 'di dag ni /
translated: the mental factors, the neutral mind, and the non-associated compositional factors,

original: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
analyzed: rgyu med pa las byung ba /
translated: are without cause,

original: 'bras bu med pa /🔽rnam par smin pa med pa yin no snyam du yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa / rnam par smin pa med pa yin no snyam du yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: without effect,🔽and without ripening.”

original: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mi dge ba'i sems pa dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention that is non-virtuous and focuses on the virtuous, non-virtuous, and neutral.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is neutral intention that focuses on the neutral?

original: smras pa / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang /
analyzed: smras pa / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang /
translated: From among these focal objects, there is the intention that is obscured and undeclared,

original: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
analyzed: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
translated: or the intention that is unobscured and undeclared.

original: yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: This is connected with the mental activity that is the formation of mind and the mental activity that is mental karma.

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o; ;lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o; ;lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: This is the undeclared intention that focuses on the undeclared. What is the undeclared intention that focuses on the virtuous?

original: smras pa / dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung @368b ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang /
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung @368b ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang /
translated: He said, “It is the wholesome actions of body and speech, the wholesome mental factors and mental states, the formations not associated with a wholesome mind, and the wholesome unconditioned factors.

original: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa la yang rung ste /
analyzed: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa la yang rung ste /
translated: From among these objects, it is the intention that is either obscured neutral or unobscured neutral.

original: yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the mental activity that is associated with the mental factors of directing the mind and the mental factors of the volition of the mind, up to and including the mental activity of the mental faculty.

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the wholesome intention that is focused on a neutral object.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the unwholesome intention that is focused on a neutral object?

original: smras pa / mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang /🔽ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
analyzed: smras pa / mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
translated: He said: “It is the nonvirtuous karma of body and speech, the nonvirtuous mind and mental factors, the formations not associated with a nonvirtuous mind, and the objects of these, whether obscured and neutral or unobscured and neutral.

original: yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the intention that is directed toward these, from the mental activity of attention up to the mental activity of the mind and mental activity.

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the intention that is neutral and focuses on nonvirtue.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba dang mi dge ba la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the intention that is neutral and focuses on virtue and nonvirtue?

original: smras pa / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams @369a *//
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams @369a *//
translated: He replied, “It is the wholesome and unwholesome bodily, verbal, and mental actions, and the wholesome and unwholesome mental factors, and the wholesome and unwholesome formations not associated with the mind.

original: dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
analyzed: dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
translated: From among these objects, it is the intention that is either obscured and neutral or unobscured and neutral,

original: yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: and it is connected with the mental activity that forms the mind, up to the mental action.

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba dang / mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o; ;lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba dang / mi dge ba la dmigs pa'o; ;lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: This is the wholesome and unwholesome intention that focuses on the neutral. What is the neutral intention that focuses on the wholesome and neutral?

original: smras pa / dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang /
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang /
translated: He said: The virtuous actions of body, the virtuous actions of speech, the virtuous mind and mental factors, the compositional factors not associated with a virtuous mind, the neutral forms, the neutral mind,🔽

original: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
analyzed: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
translated: He said: “The virtuous actions of body and speech, the virtuous minds and mental factors, the compositional factors not associated with a virtuous mind, the unobscured form, the unobscured minds and mental factors, the compositional factors not associated with an unobscured mind, and the unobscured minds and mental factors that are either obscured or unobscured.

original: yid la byed pa'i sems gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i sems gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: From among these focal objects, the minds that are directed to them, from the mental factors that are associated with them, up to the mental activity and mental karma,

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: this is the virtuous intention that is unobscured and focuses on the unobscured.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba @369b dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba @369b dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the nonvirtuous or neutral intention that focuses on neutral objects?

original: smras pa / mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang /
analyzed: smras pa / mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang /
translated: It is the nonvirtuous actions of body and speech, the nonvirtuous minds and mental factors, the formations not associated with a nonvirtuous mind, and the neutral forms.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
translated: It is the neutral minds and mental factors, the formations not associated with a neutral mind, and the obscured or unobscured neutral objects.

original: yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the intention that is the mental attention to these objects, and it is the mental formation and mental action.

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the non-defined volition which is related to non-defined action.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the non-defined volition which is related to wholesome and unwholesome action?

original: smras pa / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang /🔽lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan @370a *//
analyzed: smras pa / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang mi ldan @370a *//
translated: It is the wholesome and unwholesome action of body and speech, the wholesome and unwholesome thought and thought-concomitants, the wholesome and unwholesome formations not related to thought,

original: pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
analyzed: pa'i 'du byed rnams dang / dmigs pa 'di dag las bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa dang / ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yang rung ste /
translated: the non-defined form, the non-defined thought and thought-concomitants, the non-defined formations not related to thought, the wholesome and unwholesome thought and thought-concomitants, the wholesome and unwholesome formations not related to thought, the wholesome and unwholesome form, and the non-defined thought and thought-concomitants.🔽These are the objects of the non-defined volition which is related to wholesome and unwholesome action.

original: yid la byed pa'i sems gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i sems gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: The mental activity that is the mental factor of intention is associated with the mind and is connected with the mental factors of volition, mental activity, and mental action.

original: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dag pa dang / mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa dag pa dang / mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the pure, unwholesome, and neutral intention that is not included in the above categories.

original: de la sems pa'i las ni /
analyzed: de la sems pa'i las ni /
translated: “What is the action of intention?

original: 'dod pa dang ldan pa yang yod /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ldan pa yang yod /
translated: “It is the action of intention that is associated with the realm of desire,

original: gzugs dang ldan pa yang yod /
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa yang yod /
translated: the action of intention that is associated with the realm of form,🔽and the action of intention that is associated with the formless realm.

original: gzugs med pa dang ldan pa yang yod do; ;sems pa'i las 'dod pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs med pa dang ldan pa yang yod do; ;sems pa'i las 'dod pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the action of intention that is associated with the realm of desire?

original: smras pa / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: smras pa / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the intention that is associated with the mental activity that is associated with the realm of desire and is connected with the mental factors of volition, mental activity, and mental action.

original: 'di ni / sems pa'i las 'dod pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / sems pa'i las 'dod pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is the action of intention that is associated with the realm of desire.

original: sems pa'i las gzugs dang ldan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems pa'i las gzugs dang ldan pa gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the action of intention that is associated with the realm of form?

original: smras pa; gzugs dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang / mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: smras pa; gzugs dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang / mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the intention associated with the mental activity related to form, up to the mental activity that produces the mind and the activity of the mind.

original: 'di ni; sems pa'i las gzugs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni; sems pa'i las gzugs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is the volitional action related to form.

original: sems pa'i las gzugs med pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: sems pa'i las gzugs med pa dang ldan pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the volitional action not related to form?

original: smras pa / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang @370b mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: smras pa / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang @370b mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the intention associated with the mental activity related to the formless, up to the mental activity that produces the mind and the activity of the mind.

original: 'di ni / sems pa'i las gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / sems pa'i las gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is the volitional action related to the formless.

original: de la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa ni /🔽dge ba yang yod /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa ni / dge ba yang yod /
translated: Here, what is the intention related to desire?🔽It is good.

original: mi dge ba yang yod /
analyzed: mi dge ba yang yod /
translated: It is bad.

original: lung du ma bstan pa yod do //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa yod do //
translated: It is neutral.

original: 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the good intention related to desire?

original: smras pa / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gnag yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: smras pa / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gnag yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: He said, “It is the intention associated with the mental activity of virtue that is connected with the desire realm, up to the mental activity of the mind and the activity of the mind.

original: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba ste /
translated: This is the virtuous intention connected with the desire realm.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is it so?

original: 'di ltar chags pa med pas tshul bzhin so sor brtags nas mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang / rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang / snas dri rnams tshor ba dang / lces ro rnams myong ba dang / lus kyis reg bya rnams reg pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar chags pa med pas tshul bzhin so sor brtags nas mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang / rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang / snas dri rnams tshor ba dang / lces ro rnams myong ba dang / lus kyis reg bya rnams reg pa dang /
translated: It is like this: having properly investigated with nonattachment, the eye sees forms, the ear hears sounds, the nose smells smells, the tongue experiences tastes, the body feels touchables,

original: yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: and the mind cognizes phenomena. The intention is connected with the mental activity of the mind and the activity of the mind.

original: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
translated: This is the virtuous intention connected with the desire realm.

original: gzhan yang srog gcod pa spangs pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang srog gcod pa spangs pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang /
translated: Moreover, it is the intention concomitant with the mental activity that possesses the abandonment of taking life, the abandonment of taking what is not given, the abandonment of sexual misconduct, the abandonment of false speech, the abandonment of malicious speech, the abandonment of harsh speech,

original: tshig kyal pa dang / @371a *//
analyzed: tshig kyal pa dang / @371a *//
translated: the abandonment of frivolous speech,

original: brnab sems dang / gnod sems spangs pa dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: brnab sems dang / gnod sems spangs pa dang ldan pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: the abandonment of covetousness, the abandonment of malice, and the abandonment of wrong views.

original: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
translated: This is virtuous intention associated with desire.

original: gzhan yang khro ba med pa dang 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'chab pa med pa dang / 'tshig pa med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / g-yo med pa dang /🔽ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /🔽'di ni; 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang khro ba med pa dang 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'chab pa med pa dang / 'tshig pa med pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / g-yo med pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te / 'di ni; 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
translated: Furthermore, it is the intention that is associated with the mental activity that is free of anger, free of malice, free of hypocrisy, free of spite, free of envy, free of stinginess, free of deceit, free of fraudulence,

original: gzhan yang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i gsong por smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / mngon du ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang / 'dud pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i gsong por smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / mngon du ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor ba dang / 'dud pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
translated: and free of arrogance and conceit. It is the intention that is associated with the mental activity that is endowed with a sense of shame and with decency. original: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: up to mental activity.

original: 'di ni; 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni; 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
translated: This is virtuous intention associated with the desire realm.

original: gzhan yang sbyin pa dag sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyin pa dag sbyin pa'am /
translated: Moreover, when giving gifts,

original: gnod sems dag mi byed pa'am /
analyzed: gnod sems dag mi byed pa'am /
translated: not being malicious,

original: tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug @371b pa'am; gso sbyong la gnas pa'am /
analyzed: tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug @371b pa'am; gso sbyong la gnas pa'am /
translated: upholding the precepts one has taken, observing the purificatory fast,

original: sems dad pas rang gi lag bdar te las byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te; 'di ni /
analyzed: sems dad pas rang gi lag bdar te las byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te; 'di ni /
translated: and with a faithful mind, making offerings with one’s own hands, up to mental activity and mental action—

original: 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
translated: this is virtuous intention associated with the desire realm.

original: gzhan yang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i yid la byed pas sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal bar yid la byed pa'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i yid la byed pas sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal bar yid la byed pa'am /
translated: Moreover, with virtuous mental activity associated with the desire realm, one regards suffering as suffering,

original: kun 'byung ba la kun 'byung ba'am /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba la kun 'byung ba'am /
translated: regards the origin as the origin,

original: 'gog pa la 'gog pa'am /
analyzed: 'gog pa la 'gog pa'am /
translated: regards cessation as cessation,🔽and

original: lam la lam du yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /🔽'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
analyzed: lam la lam du yid la byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te / 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa dge ba'o //
translated: It is the intention that is associated with the mental factor of right view, from the mental factor of intention up to the mental factor of right effort.

original: 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the unvirtuous intention in the desire realm?

original: smras pa / mi dge ba'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: smras pa / mi dge ba'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the intention that is associated with the mental factor of wrong view, from the mental factor of intention up to the mental factor of wrong effort.

original: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba'o //
translated: What is the unvirtuous intention in the desire realm?🔽It is the intention that is associated with the mental factor of wrong view, from the mental factor of intention up to the mental factor of wrong effort.

original: ji lta zhe na /🔽'di ltar chags pa'am /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /🔽'di ltar chags pa'am /
translated: What is the unvirtuous intention in the desire realm?🔽It is the intention that is associated with the mental factor of wrong view, from the mental factor of intention up to the mental factor of wrong effort.

original: sdang ba'am / rmongs pas tshul bzhin ma yin pa dang / so sor ma brtags par mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba nas yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: sdang ba'am / rmongs pas tshul bzhin ma yin pa dang / so sor ma brtags par mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba nas yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the intention to see forms with the eye, to hear sounds with the ear, to smell scents with the nose, to experience tastes with the tongue, to feel touchable things with the body, and to know mental objects with the mind, without proper attention, either through hatred, or through delusion, or through not examining things individually.

original: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge @372a *//
analyzed: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge @372a *//
translated: This is the unwholesome intention associated with the desire realm.

original: ba'o; ;gzhan yang srog gcod pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang /
analyzed: ba'o; ;gzhan yang srog gcod pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang /
translated: Moreover, it is the mental activity associated with killing, stealing, sexual misconduct, lying, slander, harsh speech, and idle talk.

original: tshig kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid la byed pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: tshig kyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yid la byed pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the mental activity associated with idle gossip, covetousness, malice, and wrong views, and it is associated with the mental activity that is the volition that forms the mind and the mental activity that is the action of the mind.

original: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba'o; ;gzhan yang khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sgyu dang / g-yo dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba'o; ;gzhan yang khro ba dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sgyu dang / g-yo dang / ngo tsha mi shes pa dang /
translated: This is unwholesome volition associated with the desire realm.

original: khrel med pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: khrel med pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: Moreover, it is the volition associated with anger, enmity, hypocrisy, malice, jealousy, stinginess, deceit, fraud, shamelessness, and lack of conscience, and it is associated with the mental activity that is the volition that forms the mind and the mental activity that is the action of the mind.

original: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba'o //
translated: This is unwholesome volition associated with the desire realm.

original: gzhan yang lag pa dang / khu tshur dang / thal lcag bsnun pa dang / yal ga dang lcug mas gnod par byed pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang lag pa dang / khu tshur dang / thal lcag bsnun pa dang / yal ga dang lcug mas gnod par byed pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang /
translated: Moreover, it is the intention associated with the mental activity of beating with hands, fists, sticks, and clods of earth, and with branches and stalks.

original: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the mental activity that is associated with the mental action of the mind.

original: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi @372b dge ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi @372b dge ba'o //
translated: This is unwholesome intention associated with the desire realm.🔽Moreover, it is the intention associated with unwholesome fetters, bonds, latent tendencies, and envelopments.

original: gzhan yang mi dge ba kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas dkris pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
analyzed: gzhan yang mi dge ba kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas dkris pa rnams dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /
translated: It is the mental activity that is associated with the mental action of the mind.

original: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa mi dge ba'o //

analyzed: 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na; smras pa /

analyzed: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba nas yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi sems pa gang yin pa nas sems mngon par 'du byed pa dang / yid kyi las kyi bar du sbyar te /

original: 'di ni / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sems pa lung du ma bstan pa'o //

translated: Moreover, it is the intention associated with the neutral fetters, bonds, latent tendencies, secondary afflictions, and entanglements that pertain to the desire realm.
